title: Sofia & Jack: Pets Evolution
summary: Casual evolution/merge-style game where players rescue and evolve adorable animal cubs.
description:
Sofia & Jack: Pets Evolution is a casual evolution/merge-style game where players rescue and evolve adorable animal cubs into stronger forms, unlocking new species as they progress through multiple areas and maps.

The game focuses on collection and evolution-driven progression, with quality-of-life features such as auto-merge mechanics introduced in later updates.

This title has been removed from official stores; archived listings and gameplay videos are still available online.
responsibilities: Implemented and polished UI and gameplay flows for the core evolution loop (collect, merge/evolve, unlock new species, progression through maps).
Built configuration-driven systems to support content iteration (areas/maps progression, rewards, economy tuning).
Optimized performance and stability on mobile devices (loading, memory usage, and runtime smoothness).
Collaborated with design/QA to validate progression balance and edge cases across devices.

highlights.label: Gameplay loop
highlights.value: Rescue & evolve pets; unlock new species
